item.title: ‘The Super Mario Bros. Movie’ has surpassed ‘Frozen’ to become the 2nd highest-grossing animated movie of all time.

item.title:
‘The Flash’ director Andy Muschietti confirms Ezra Miller will reprise their role as Barry Allen if sequel is greenlit:
"If a sequel happens, yes [Miller would be Flash]. I don’t think there’s anyone that can play that character as well as they did.”
: https://deadline.com/2023/05/the-flash-wants-ezra-miller-reprise-superhero-role-sequel-1235383206/…
